ED_DecisionText:
At its 2nd plenary meeting, on 15 September 2017, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the General Committee as set forth in its first report,  adopted a number of provisions concerning the organization of the seventy-second session.

(See A/72/250; A/72/PV.2)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/72/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
